xuiDatePicker
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Date Picker component.

Usage

as element:
<xui-date-picker
       name="{string}"
       caption="{string}"
       [display-inline="{boolean}"]
       ng-model="{string}"
       min-date="{date}"
       max-date="{date}"
       is-required="{boolean}"
       is-disabled="{boolean}"
       [preserve-insignificant="{boolean}"]
       [ng-change="{function}"]>
</xui-date-picker>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
namestring

Supply a name to bind this component to a form.

captionstring

Value used as a label for the date picker.

display-inline
(optional)
boolean

Whether the datepicker control should be displayed inline.

ng-modelstring

The model that the value of the date picker is bound to.

min-datedate

Defines the minimum available date.

(default: null)

max-datedate

Defines the maximum available date.

(default: null)

is-requiredboolean

Whether this component should be validated as required.

is-disabledboolean

Whether this component is enabled or not.

preserve-insignificant
(optional)
boolean

Whether the time data is preserved.

ng-change
(optional)
function

Model value change event handler.

Example
